message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I think the product is worth less than $150 to me. Would you consider selling it for $120?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $120 is below its value. Could you do $135?
Hello Alice, I understand your position. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose $125 as my maximum offer.
